descriptions.text: The faint smell of rot wafts towards you. Nothing edible has been prepared here for a long time.
You enter what must be the kitchen, if the giant stone hearth and scorched pots are any indication.
The kitchen is barren. You see little beyond a sink, a countertop, some pots, and, of course, the giant stone hearth.
!!! CONDITIONAL DESCRIPTION TEST !!! The skull almost glows with an odd glint as you enter the moudly-smelling kitchen.
!!! CONDITIONAL DESCRIPTION TEST !!! You feel the hollow eye sockets of the skull staring into you as you explore the dirty kitchen.
